```pddl
[
  '(:action swing ; Swing an object into a position for interaction
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?object - item)
    :precondition (and (adjacent ?object ?agent) (not (engaged ?object ?agent)))
    :effect (and (engaged ?object ?agent) (not (adjacent ?object ?agent)))',
  
  '(:action put ; Put an object into a designated state
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?object - item ?target - location)
    :precondition (and (possesses ?agent ?object) (not (at ?object ?target)))
    :effect (and (at ?object ?target) (not (possesses ?agent ?object)))',
  
  '(:action hold ; Hold an item or control a mechanism
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - item)
    :precondition (and (accessible ?item ?agent) (not (holding ?agent ?item)))
    :effect (holding ?agent ?item))',
  
  '(:action pedal ; Pedal to initiate movement
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?vehicle - vehicle ?control - control)
    :precondition (and (situated ?vehicle ?agent) (grasping ?control ?agent ?vehicle) (in-contact ?pedal ?agent))
    :effect (and (in-motion ?vehicle) (not (stationary ?vehicle)))',
  
  '(:action stop ; Universal stop action to halt an activity or object
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - item)
    :precondition (and (engaged ?agent ?entity) (moving ?entity))
    :effect (and (stopped ?entity) (not (moving ?entity)))'
]
```
